name: Tesco Scottish Reared Healthy Living Steak Mince 500G
description: Tesco puts quality first when it comes to its fresh meat and ensures that the
farms supplying our approved abattoirs are farm assured and meet the high
standards of the Tesco Livestock Code of Practice. Typically less than 5% fat.
Very lean and versatile for cooking.
